itemDescription: Welsh rugby union footballer and coach

wikipedia_page.main: Paul John (born 25 January 1970 in Pontypridd) is a former Wales international rugby union player with 10 caps. He is the son of Dennis John, former Wales head coach.

response: *Paul John (rugby union) (born 1970), former Wales international rugby union player
*Paul John (Yupik elder) (1929–2015), American Yup'ik elder, cultural advocate and commercial fisherman
*Paul John (whisky), a brand of Indian single malt and single cask whisky
